db:abstract.db:para: Shows the hierarchy of MIME types and can be used to determine the MIME type of a file.

db:article.db:programlisting:
TEMPLATE = app QT += widgets CONFIG -= app_bundle CONFIG += c++11
SOURCES += \ main.cpp \ mimetypemodel.cpp \ mainwindow.cpp
HEADERS += \ mimetypemodel.h \ mainwindow.h
target.path = $$[QT_INSTALL_EXAMPLES]/corelib/mimetypes/mimetypebrowser INSTALLS += target
